item.title: Annual work summary from 2019.03 - 2020.07
item.author: xianpeng.shen@gmail.com (Xianpeng Shen)
item.description: Summarizes my work achievements and contributions as a Build Release/DevOps engineer from March 2019 to July 2020, including build automation, integration, and infrastructure management.
